name: Cool Duel V.9999
description:
The next step in combat's evolution:

C o o l ☆ D u e l ☆ features the most fluid and tactical combat never before realized in the tabletop space. Challenge your friends to fast paced combat skirmishes, choosing weapons that best suit your martial desires, and experience squad commanding when you add in companions to the mix.

In addition to the game rulebook, this demo includes auto filling character sheets, though this game was designed with every intention to remove number crunch and make the game as accessible as possible.

In the 1.0 release I will be including maps for use in virtual table top, otherwise enjoy the duel 😎
